trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGZF103_05157_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Zilekke can ill afford any delays.
TEXT_KINGZF103_05157_TODO_00<tab>Get the captivated courier's attention with a /poke.
TEXT_KINGZF103_05157_ZILEKKE_000_000<tab>Oh, hello there. You're an adventurer, right? Can I interest you in a job?
TEXT_KINGZF103_05157_ZILEKKE_000_001<tab>We're supposed to send out a shipment of electrope today, but the courier in charge appears to be taking her sweet time.

TEXT_KINGZF103_05157_ZILEKKE_000_002<tab>If our shipment falls behind schedule, it will bring Everkeep's factories to a screeching halt. I have to stay and handle things here, so could you go and tell the courier she has a job to do, please?

TEXT_KINGZF103_05157_ZILEKKE_000_003<tab>Given her obsession with technology, like as not, you'll find her wherever there's a clear view of the bucket elevator. She may not hear you approach, so give her a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>poke<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> if you need to.

TEXT_KINGZF103_05157_ZILEKKE_000_004<tab>The courier I speak of tends to linger in places where there's a clear view of the bucket elevator. She may not hear you approach, so give her a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>poke<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> if you need to.

TEXT_KINGZF103_05157_SYSTEM_000_006<tab>The captivated courier does not appear to have noticed you. Perhaps a small <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>poke<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> will get her attention.

TEXT_KINGZF103_05157_COURIER05157_000_008<tab>Ah, you're here about the delivery─oh gods, the <var 1A 02 /var>delivery<var 1A 01 /var>! I was so enraptured watching the elevator that I must have lost track of time. Again...

TEXT_KINGZF103_05157_COURIER05157_000_009<tab>I admit, I never get sick of seeing it in action. The hover cargo we use is great and all, but I mean, it can't possibly compare to the sheer <var 1A 02 /var>scale<var 1A 01 /var> of─
TEXT_KINGZF103_05157_COURIER05157_000_010<tab>Gah, no, I can't start rambling now! Sorry, but I'd better get back to work!
TEXT_KINGZF103_05157_ZILEKKE_000_011<tab>Thanks for the assistance. Much as I can appreciate a fellow enthusiast of our technology, I can't allow it to impact our work.
TEXT_KINGZF103_05157_ZILEKKE_000_012<tab>The electrope we excavate here is a lifeline for Everkeep, and I do mean that quite literally.

TEXT_KINGZF103_05157_ZILEKKE_000_013<tab>This precious resource is used to create all manner of things, from daily necessities to heavy machinery, so you can imagine how a single hitch in the supply chain risks a ripple effect of chaos.
TEXT_KINGZF103_05157_ZILEKKE_000_014<tab>At any rate, here's a little something for your trouble.
